

Add
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000001010 -- Addi $t1, $zero 10
00000001000010010101000000100000 -- Add $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 20

And
00100000000010000111111110000000 -- Addi $t0, 0111111110000000
00100000000010010000000001111111 -- Addi $t1, 0000000001111111
00000001000010010101000000100100 -- And $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 0

Or
00100000000010000111111110000000 -- Addi $t0, 0111111110000000
00100000000010010000000001111111 -- Addi $t1, 0000000001111111
00000001000010010101000000100101 -- Or $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 0111111111111111

Sub
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000001001 -- Addi $t1, $zero 9
00000001000010010101000000100010 -- Sub $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 1

SLT - 1
00100000000010000000000000000000 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 0
00100000000010010000000000000001 -- Addi $t1, $zero 1
00000001000010010101000000101010 -- Slt $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result $t2 = 1

SLT - 0
00100000000010000000000000000001 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 1
00100000000010010000000000000000 -- Addi $t1, $zero 0
00000001000010010101000000101010 -- Slt $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result $t2 = 0

sll
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00000000000010000100100010000000 -- sll $t1, $t0, 1
00000000000010000100100010000000
expected result 40 

srl
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00000000000010000100100001000010 -- srl $t1, $t0, 1
expected result 5 

sllv
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000000001 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 1
00000001001010000101000000000100 -- sllv $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 20

srlv
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000000001 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 1
00000001001010000101000000000110 -- srlv $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 5

NOR 
00100000000010000111111110000000 -- Addi $t0, 0111111110000000
00100000000010010000000001111111 -- Addi $t1, 0000000001111111
00000001000010010101000000100111 -- Nor $t2, $t0, $t1
expected result 0xffff8000

LUI
00111100000010001111111111111111 -- Lui $t0, 0xffffffff
Expected result 0xffff0000

Beq - 1
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000001010 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 10
00010001000010010000000000000001 -- beq $t0, t1, 0x00000001
00100000000010100000000000001010 -- Addi $t2, $zer0 10
00100000000010110000000000001010 -- Addi $t3, $zer0 10
Expected result $t2 = 0
Expected result $t3 = 10

Beq - 2
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000001011 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 11
00010001000010010000000000000001 -- beq $t0, $t1, 0x00000001
00100000000010100000000000001010 -- Addi $t2, $zer0 10
00100000000010110000000000001010 -- Addi $t3, $zer0 10
Expected result $t2 = 10
Expected result $t3 = 10


Bne - 1
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000001010 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 10
00010101000010010000000000000001 -- bne $t0, t1, 0x00000001
00100000000010100000000000001010 -- Addi $t2, $zer0 10
00100000000010110000000000001010 -- Addi $t3, $zer0 10
Expected result $t2 = 10
Expected result $t3 = 10

Bne - 2
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00100000000010010000000000001011 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 11
00010101000010010000000000000001 -- bne $t0, $t1, 0x00000001
00100000000010100000000000001010 -- Addi $t2, $zer0 10
00100000000010110000000000001010 -- Addi $t3, $zer0 10
Expected result $t2 = 0
Expected result $t3 = 10

Jump
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zer0 10
00001000000000000000000000000010 -- Jump 0x00000002
00100000000010010000000000001010 -- Addi $t1, $zer0 10
00100000000010100000000000001010 -- Addi $t2, $zer0 10 
00100000000010110000000000001010 -- Addi $t3, $zer0 10 
Expected result $t3 = 10

Jal, jr
00100000000001000000000000001010 -- Addi $a0, $zero 10
00001100000000000000000000000010 -- Jal 0x00000003
00100000010010000000000000000001 -- Addi $t0, $v0, 1
00001000000000000000000000000010 -- Jump 0x00000002
00000000000001000001000001000000 -- sll $v0, $a0, 1
00000011111000000000000000001000 -- Jr ra
00000000000000000000000000000000 -- nop 

lw, sw

00100000000111010000000000001000 -- Addi $sp, $zero, 8
00100000000010000000000000001010 -- Addi $t0, $zero 10
10101111101010000000000000000100 -- sw $t0, 4($sp)
10001111101010010000000000000100 -- lw $t1, 4($sp)
